title: Playful Pluto
creator_credit: Joseph Schenck and Walt Disney Animation Studios
brief_description: Animated cartoon starring Mickey Mouse and Pluto. Begins with Mickey raking up leaves in his garden and playful Pluto trying his best to be helpful but instead creating total mayhem, going from one catastrophe to another.
creator_credit_for_label: Joseph Schenck and Walt Disney Animation Studios
